sentences.en: A queue forms outside Peter's study.
sentences.cn: 彼得书房外面排起了队。

sentences.en: All objects will be drawn once without lighting, then lighting of all objects will be rendered together at the end of the render queue.
sentences.cn: 所有对象将无照明绘制一次，然后所有对象的照明将一起在渲染队列的末尾被渲染。

sentences.en: Another 29,100 people have joined the dole queue.
sentences.cn: 又有29,100人加入了失业大军。

sentences.en: Behind him was a long queue of angry motorists.
sentences.cn: 在他的身后，愤怒的司机排成了长龙。

sentences.en: By 10 o'clock a long queue had formed outside the bank.
sentences.cn: 到十点钟时,银行门外已经排成了长队.

sentences.en: File not in print queue.
sentences.cn: 文件不在打印队列中。

sentences.en: I had to join a queue for the toilets.
sentences.cn: 我只得排队等着上厕所。

sentences.en: I watched as he got a tray and joined the queue.
sentences.cn: 我看着他拿了个托盘排起了队。

sentences.en: Make sure you join the queue inside the bank.
sentences.cn: 在银行里一定要排队。

sentences.en: Please queue up to register.
sentences.cn: 请排队挂号。

sentences.en: She waited in the bus queue.
sentences.cn: 她排队等公共汽车。

sentences.en: Single parents got priority in the housing queue.
sentences.cn: 单亲父母在申请住房时享有优先权。

sentences.en: Some of the people queuing for tickets had been there since dawn.
sentences.cn: 购票队伍中有些人天刚亮就来了。

sentences.en: The queue for places at the school has never been longer.
sentences.cn: 排队申请上这所学校的人数达到历史最高峰。

sentences.en: the tail end of the queue
sentences.cn: 队尾

sentences.en: There was a permanent 20-yard queue for the portable toilets.
sentences.cn: 流动厕所前总排着20码长的队伍。

sentences.en: There was still a queue for tickets on the night.
sentences.cn: 晚上仍然有人在排队买票。

sentences.en: To what window are you standing in a queue?
sentences.cn: 你在排哪个窗口的队?

sentences.en: We all had to queue up for our ration books.
sentences.cn: 我们都得排队领取定量配给票证薄。

sentences.en: We tailed a long queue.
sentences.cn: 我们排在一个长队的末尾。

sentences.en: What if we want to write to a file outside the database or send the auditing record on a message queue?
sentences.cn: 如果我们想写入数据库外部的一个文件，或者发送一个消息队列上的审计记录，又该如何做呢？

sentences.en: You’ll have to join the queue.
sentences.cn: 你得排队。

trans.tran_cn: 队伍，等待的人群，队列（计算机用语）
trans.tran_en: a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move
to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere
to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere
